project1.title: Pinterest
project1.description: Our first CRUD app using Firebase and Google authentication. Log in with a google account and create boards and pins of your favorite things!

project2.title: Tamagotchi
project2.description: Tamagotchi was our first time using webpack and SCSS. The objective was to create an app inspired by the popular 90s game. Go play. Eat healthy.

project3.title: Bear Watcher
project3.description: Bear Watcher was our introduction to ES6 Modules. The objective was to create a page that took user input and tracked bears. Go catch a fish!
